General.Name: Hangzhou Gaoxin Rubber & Plastic Materials Co Ltd
General.Description: Hangzhou Gaoxin Rubber & Plastic Materials Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells polymer rubber and plastic materials in China. It serves customers in the fields of electric power, shipbuilding, rail transit, communication, electrical equipment, construction, new energy, and others. The company was formerly known as Hangzhou Gaoxin Insulation Materials Co., Ltd. Hangzhou Gaoxin Rubber & Plastic Materials Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
